product_name: Rossignol Zymax Universal Cross-Country Skis - Juniors'
long_description: The Rossignol Zymax Universal skis are dual-discipline junior skis designed for both skate and classic skiing. A soft flex and grippy kick zone provide stable handling and easy kicking.
short_description: The Rossignol Zymax Universal skis are dual-discipline junior skis designed for both skate and classic skiing. A soft flex and grippy kick zone provide stable handling and easy kicking.
